original_text: We have much to say about this, but it is hard to make it clear to you because you no longer try to understand.
korean_text: 멜기세덱에 관하여는 우리가 할 말이 많으나 너희가 듣는 것이 둔하므로 설명하기 어려우니라

sentences.original_text: We have much to say about this
but it is hard to make it clear to you
because you no longer try to understand
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 더 이상 이해하려고 노력하지 않기 때문입니다
